trans-unit.source: Intermediate multiplication will wrap around silently in case of overflow.
trans-unit.target: 中间乘法会在溢出时默默地环绕。

trans-unit.source: Internally a symbol is represented as an Int32, so it's very efficient.
trans-unit.target: 在内部，符号表示为 Int32 ，因此非常有效。

trans-unit.source: Internally, symbols are implemented as constants with a numeric value of type Int32.
trans-unit.target: 在内部，符号被实现为具有 Int32 类型数值的常量。

trans-unit.source: Internally, the compiler rewrites command literals to calls to the top-level method `():String-class-method) with a string literal containing the command as argument: `echo #{argument}` and %x(echo #{argument}) are rewritten to `("echo #{argument}").
trans-unit.target: 在内部，编译器使用包含命令作为参数的字符串文字将命令文字重写为对顶级方法 `() ：String-class-method）的调用： `echo #{argument}` 和 %x(echo #{argument}) 重写为 `("echo #{argument}") 。

trans-unit.source: Internally, the time is stored as an Int64 representing seconds from epoch (0001-01-01 00:00:00.0 UTC) and an Int32 representing nanosecond-of-second with value range 0..999_999_999.
trans-unit.target: 在内部，时间存储为 Int64 ,它表示从纪元（ 0001-01-01 00:00:00.0 UTC ）起的秒数，而 Int32 则表示以秒为单位的纳秒，其值范围为 0..999_999_999 。

trans-unit.source: Interpolation works in regular expression literals just as it does in string literals. Be aware that using this feature will cause an exception to be raised at runtime, if the resulting string results in an invalid regular expression.

trans-unit.source: Interprets this string as containing a sequence of hexadecimal values and decodes it as a slice of bytes.

trans-unit.source: Intersection: returns a new set containing elements common to both sets.

trans-unit.source: Invalid chars (in the range U+D800..U+DFFF) are encoded with the unicode replacement char value 0xfffd.

trans-unit.source: Invalid values are encoded using the unicode replacement char with codepoint 0xfffd.

trans-unit.source: Inverts all bits in the array.
Inverts all bits in the array. Falses become true and vice versa.
trans-unit.target: 反转数组中的所有位。假变成 true ，反之亦然。

trans-unit.source: Invoke this method on an HTTP::Client before executing an HTTP request.

trans-unit.source: Invokes next on the wrapped iterator and returns stop if the given value was a Iterator::Stop.

trans-unit.target: 在包装的迭代器上调用 next ，如果给定值为 Iterator::Stop ，则返回 stop 。否则，返回值。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the block for each of the given nodes keys and values, resolving merge keys (<<) when found (keys and values of the resolved merge mappings are yielded, recursively).
trans-unit.target: 为每个给定节点的键和值调用该块，并在找到时解析合并键（<<）（递归产生已解析的合并映射的键和值）。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the block once for each row in this CSV, yielding self.

trans-unit.source: Invokes the given block for each element of self, replacing the element with the value returned by the block.

trans-unit.source: Invokes the given block for each element of self, replacing the element with the value returned by the block. Returns self.
trans-unit.target: 为 self 的每个元素调用给定的块，用该块返回的值替换该元素。返回 self 。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the given block with each Char in this IO.
trans-unit.target: 用此 IO 中的每个 Char 调用给定的块。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the given block with each line in this IO, where a line is defined by the arguments passed to this method, which can be the same ones as in the #gets methods.

trans-unit.source: Invokes the given block with each byte (UInt8) in this IO.
trans-unit.target: 使用此 IO 中的每个字节（ UInt8 ）调用给定的块。

trans-unit.source: Invokes this Proc and returns the result.
trans-unit.target: 调用此 Proc 并返回结果。
调用 #read_next 读取下一个事件。

trans-unit.source: Invoking .new on a Reference allocates a new instance on the heap. The instance's memory is automatically freed (garbage-collected) when the instance is no longer referred by any other entity in the program.
trans-unit.target: 在 Reference 上调用 .new 会在堆上分配一个新实例。当实例不再由程序中的其他任何实体引用时，实例的内存将自动释放（垃圾回收）。

trans-unit.target: 也可以使用 #bind(socket : Socket::Server) 绑定通用 Socket::Server ，该绑定可用于自定义网络协议配置。

trans-unit.source: It is conceptually similar to an operating system thread but with less overhead and completely internal to the Crystal process. The runtime includes a scheduler which schedules execution of fibers.
trans-unit.target: 它在概念上类似于操作系统线程,但开销较少,完全在Crystal进程内部。运行时包括一个调度器,它可以调度纤维的执行。

trans-unit.source: It is created by enclosing an UTF-8 character in single quotes.

trans-unit.source: It is encouraged to delete a tempfile after using it, which ensures they are not left behind in your filesystem until garbage collected.
trans-unit.target: 我们鼓励大家在使用完tempfile后删除它,这样可以确保它们不会遗留在你的文件系统中,直到垃圾回收。

trans-unit.source: It is for convenience with using on case statement.
trans-unit.target: 为了方便使用on case 语句。

trans-unit.source: It is generally recommended to keep instances in UTC and only apply a local time zone when formatting for user display, unless the domain logic requires having a specific time zone (for example for calendaric operations).

trans-unit.source: It is implemented under the hood with GMP.
trans-unit.target: 它是在GMP幕后实施的。

trans-unit.source: It is important to have in mind that if one of the operations fails then the final state would be inconsistent. So we need to execute the two operations (deposit and withdraw) as one operation. And if an error occurs then we would like to go back in time as if that one operation was never executed.
trans-unit.target: 重要的是要记住，如果其中一项操作失败，则最终状态将是不一致的。因此，我们需要将两个操作（存款和取款）作为一个操作执行。如果发生错误，那么我们想回到过去，就好像从未执行过该操作一样。

trans-unit.source: It is initially configured according to system environment settings, but its value can be changed:
trans-unit.target: 它最初是根据系统环境设置配置的,但其值可以更改。

trans-unit.source: It is internally represented by a pair of BigInt and UInt64: value and scale. Value contains the actual value, and scale tells the decimal point place. E.g. when value is 1234 and scale 2, the result is 12.34.
trans-unit.target: 它内部由一对 BigInt 和 UInt64 表示：值和小数位数。值包含实际值，刻度表示小数点后的位置。例如，当value为 1234 且标度为 2 时，结果为 12.34 。

trans-unit.source: It is often used in generic code, to make use of the compiler's type inference capabilities:
trans-unit.target: 它经常被用于通用代码中,以利用编译器的类型推理能力。

trans-unit.source: It is possible to define a macro which generates one or more macro definitions. You must escape macro expressions of the inner macro by preceding them with a backslash character "\" to prevent them from being evaluated by the outer macro.
trans-unit.target: 可以定义一个宏,生成一个或多个宏定义。你必须在内部宏的宏表达式前加上反斜杠字符"/",以防止它们被外部宏评估。

trans-unit.source: It is possible to directly call methods on heredoc string literals, or use them inside parentheses:
trans-unit.target: 可以直接调用 heredoc 字符串的方法,也可以在括号内使用它们。

trans-unit.source: It is possible to make a custom RNG by including Random and implementing #next_u to return an unsigned number of a pre-determined type (usually UInt32). The numbers generated by your RNG must be uniformly distributed in the whole range of possible values for that type (e.g. 0u32..UInt32::MAX). This allows all other methods of Random to be based on this and still produce uniformly distributed results. Your Random class should also have a way to initialize it. For pseudo-random number generators that will usually be an integer seed, but there are no rigid requirements for the initialization.
trans-unit.target: 可以通过包含 Random 并实现 #next_u 以返回预定类型的无符号数（通常为 UInt32 ）来制作自定义RNG 。您的RNG生成的数字必须均匀地分布在该类型的所有可能值范围内（例如 0u32..UInt32::MAX ）。这使得 Random 的所有其他方法都可以以此为基础，并且仍然可以产生均匀分布的结果。您的 Random 类还应该有一种初始化它的方法。对于通常是整数种子的伪随机数生成器，但初始化没有严格的要求。

trans-unit.source: It is recommended to use a secure source, such as Random::Secure, Random::ISAAC or ChaCha20 for anything that needs security, such as online games, identification tokens, salts, initializing a PRNG, ... These PRNG are slower but cryptographically secure, so a third party can't deduce incoming numbers.
trans-unit.target: 对于需要安全的任何事物，例如在线游戏，识别令牌，盐，初始化PRNG等，建议使用安全的源，例如 Random::Secure ， Random::ISAAC 或ChaCha20……这些PRNG速度较慢，但密码学上是安全的，因此第三方无法推断出传入的号码。

trans-unit.source: It is recommended to use the secure Random::Secure as a source or another cryptographically quality PRNG such as Random::ISAAC or ChaCha20.
trans-unit.target: 建议使用安全的 Random::Secure 作为源或其他具有加密质量的PRNG，例如 Random::ISAAC 或ChaCha20。

trans-unit.source: It is strongly recommended to use a cryptographically random source for random, such as Random::Secure.
trans-unit.target: 强烈建议使用加密的随机源随机，如 Random::Secure 。

trans-unit.source: It serves both to perform requests by an HTTP::Client and to represent requests received by an HTTP::Server.
trans-unit.target: 它既可以执行 HTTP::Client 请求，又可以表示 HTTP::Server 接收的请求。

trans-unit.source: It takes named arguments, a named tuple literal or a hash literal as argument, in which attributes and types are defined. Once defined, Object#from_yaml populates properties of the class from the YAML document.
trans-unit.target: 它使用命名参数，命名元组文字或哈希文字作为参数，在其中定义属性和类型。定义后， Object#from_yaml 会从YAML文档中填充类的属性。

trans-unit.source: It's worth mentioning that the method returns a DB::Connection object. trans-unit.source: JSON key-value pairs that are outside of the OAuth2 spec are stored in this property in case they are needed. Their value is the raw JSON string found in the JSON value (with possible changes in the string format, but preserving JSON semantic). For example if the value was [1, 2, 3] then the value in this hash will be the string "[1,2,3]".
trans-unit.target: 如果需要，则OAuth2规范之外的JSON键值对将存储在此属性中。它们的值是在JSON值中找到的原始JSON字符串（可能会更改字符串格式，但保留JSON语义）。例如，如果值是 [1, 2, 3] 则此哈希中的值将是字符串“ [1,2,3]”。

trans-unit.source: Keys are read by invoking from_json_object_key? on this hash's key type (K), which must return a value of type K or nil. If nil is returned a JSON::ParseException is raised.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用 from_json_object_key? 读取密钥？在此哈希的键类型（ K ）上，该键必须返回 K 或 nil 类型的值。如果返回 nil ,则会引发 JSON::ParseException 。

trans-unit.source: Keys are serialized by invoking to_json_object_key on them. Values are serialized with the usual #to_json(json : JSON::Builder) method.
trans-unit.target: 通过在键上调用 to_json_object_key 来序列化键。使用通常的 #to_json(json : JSON::Builder) 方法序列化值。

trans-unit.source: Last but not least: beware of denial of services! Always protect your application using an external strategy (eg: rate limiting), otherwise endpoints that verifies bcrypt hashes will be an easy target.

trans-unit.source: Logs a message if the logger's current severity is lower or equal to 6.
trans-unit.target: 如果记录器的当前严重性低于或等于 6 ,则记录一条消息。

trans-unit.source: Logs can also be created from a type directly. For the type DB::Pool the source db.pool will be used. For generic types as Foo::Bar(Baz) the source foo.bar will be used (i.e. without generic arguments).
trans-unit.target: 也可以直接从类型创建日志。对于 DB::Pool 类型，将使用源 db.pool 。对于作为 Foo::Bar(Baz) 的泛型类型，将使用源 foo.bar （即，没有泛型参数）。

trans-unit.source: Logs the message as returned from the given block if severity is higher or equal with the loggers current severity.
trans-unit.target: 如果严重性高于或等于记录器当前的严重性，则记录从给定块返回的消息。

trans-unit.source: Logs the message as returned from the given block if severity is higher or equal with the loggers current severity. The block is not run if severity is lower. progname overrides a default progname set in this logger.
trans-unit.target: 如果严重性高于或等于记录器当前的严重性，则记录从给定块返回的消息。如果严重性较低，则不运行该块。progname会覆盖此记录器中设置的默认progname。

trans-unit.source: Logs the message as returned from the given block if the logger's current severity is lower or equal to DEBUG.
trans-unit.target: 如果记录器的当前严重性 DEBUG 或等于DEBUG，则记录从给定块返回的消息。

trans-unit.source: Logs the message as returned from the given block if the logger's current severity is lower or equal to DEBUG. The block is not run if the severity is higher. progname overrides a default progname set in this logger.
trans-unit.target: 如果记录器的当前严重性 DEBUG 或等于DEBUG，则记录从给定块返回的消息。如果严重性更高，则不运行该块。progname会覆盖此记录器中设置的默认progname。

trans-unit.source: Logs the message as returned from the given block if the logger's current severity is lower or equal to ERROR.
trans-unit.target: 如果记录器的当前严重性小于或等于 ERROR ,则记录从给定块返回的消息。

trans-unit.source: Logs the message as returned from the given block if the logger's current severity is lower or equal to ERROR. The block is not run if the severity is higher. progname overrides a default progname set in this logger.
trans-unit.target: 如果记录器的当前严重性小于或等于 ERROR ,则记录从给定块返回的消息。如果严重性更高，则不运行该块。progname会覆盖此记录器中设置的默认progname。

trans-unit.target: 如果记录器的当前严重性 FATAL 或等于FATAL，则记录从给定块返回的消息。

trans-unit.source: Logs the message as returned from the given block if the logger's current severity is lower or equal to FATAL. The block is not run if the severity is higher. progname overrides a default progname set in this logger.
trans-unit.target: 如果记录器的当前严重性 FATAL 或等于FATAL，则记录从给定块返回的消息。如果严重性更高，则不运行该块。progname会覆盖此记录器中设置的默认progname。

trans-unit.source: Logs the message as returned from the given block if the logger's current severity is lower or equal to INFO.
trans-unit.target: 如果记录器的当前严重性小于或等于 INFO ,则记录从给定块返回的消息。

trans-unit.source: Logs the message as returned from the given block if the logger's current severity is lower or equal to INFO. The block is not run if the severity is higher. progname overrides a default progname set in this logger.
trans-unit.target: 如果记录器的当前严重性小于或等于 INFO ,则记录从给定块返回的消息。如果严重性更高，则不运行该块。progname会覆盖此记录器中设置的默认progname。

trans-unit.target: 如果记录器的当前严重性 UNKNOWN 或等于UNKNOWN，则记录从给定块返回的消息。

trans-unit.source: Logs the message as returned from the given block if the logger's current severity is lower or equal to UNKNOWN. The block is not run if the severity is higher. progname overrides a default progname set in this logger.
trans-unit.target: 如果记录器的当前严重性 UNKNOWN 或等于UNKNOWN，则记录从给定块返回的消息。如果严重性更高，则不运行该块。progname会覆盖此记录器中设置的默认progname。

trans-unit.source: Logs the message as returned from the given block if the logger's current severity is lower or equal to WARN.
trans-unit.target: 如果记录器的当前严重性 WARN 或等于WARN，则记录从给定块返回的消息。

trans-unit.target: 如果记录器的当前严重性 WARN 或等于WARN，则记录从给定块返回的消息。如果严重性更高，则不运行该块。progname会覆盖此记录器中设置的默认progname。

trans-unit.source: Looks up the MIME type associated with extension.
Looks up the MIME type associated with the extension in filename.
trans-unit.target: 在filename中查找与扩展名关联的MIME类型。
为开发者提供低级信息

trans-unit.source: Macro conditionals can be used outside a macro definition:
trans-unit.target: 宏条件可以在宏定义之外使用。

trans-unit.source: Macro defs allow you to define a method for a class hierarchy which is then instantiated for each concrete subtype.
trans-unit.target: 宏定义允许你为一个类的层次结构定义一个方法,然后为每个具体的子类型实例化。

trans-unit.source: Macro expressions are evaluated both within comments as well as compilable sections of code. This may be used to provide relevant documentation for expansions:
trans-unit.target: 宏表达式既可以在注释中评估,也可以在代码的可编译部分评估。这可以用来为扩展提供相关文档。

trans-unit.source: Macro iterations can be used outside a macro definition:
trans-unit.target: 宏迭代可以在宏定义之外使用。

trans-unit.source: Macros are methods that receive AST nodes at compile-time and produce code that is pasted into a program. For example:
trans-unit.target: 宏是在编译时接收AST节点的方法,并产生粘贴到程序中的代码。例如:"宏 "是指在编译时接收AST节点,并生成粘贴到程序中的代码的方法。

trans-unit.source: Macros can access constants. For example:
trans-unit.target: 宏可以访问常量。例如:"宏 "是指在编译时接收AST节点,并生成粘贴到程序中的代码的方法。

trans-unit.source: Macros declared at the top-level are visible anywhere. If a top-level macro is marked as private it is only accessible in that file.
trans-unit.target: 在顶层声明的宏在任何地方都可见。如果顶级宏标记为 private ，则只能在该文件中访问。

trans-unit.source: Macros defined in classes and modules can be invoked from outside of them too:
trans-unit.target: 在类和模块中定义的宏也可以从它们的外部调用。

trans-unit.source: Main code can also be inside type declarations:
trans-unit.target: 主代码也可以在类型声明里面。

trans-unit.source: Main code, the code that is run when you compile and run a program, can be written directly in a source file without the need to put it in a special "main" method:
trans-unit.target: 主代码,即编译和运行程序时运行的代码,可以直接写在源文件中,而不需要把它放在一个特殊的 "main "方法中。

trans-unit.source: Main function that acts as C's main function.
Main function that acts as C's main function. Invokes Crystal.main.
trans-unit.target: 充当C的主要功能的主要功能。调用 Crystal.main 。

trans-unit.source: Main interface of the Benchmark module.
Main interface of the Benchmark module. Yields a Job to which one can report the benchmarks. See the module's description.
trans-unit.target: Benchmark 模块的主界面。产生一个 Job 到一个可以报告的基准。请参阅模块说明。

trans-unit.source: Main method run by all Crystal programs at startup.
trans-unit.target: 所有Crystal程序在启动时运行的主要方法。

trans-unit.source: Main operations are storing a key-value mapping (#[]=) and querying the value associated to a key (#[]). Key-value mappings can also be deleted (#delete). Keys are unique within a hash. When adding a key-value mapping with a key that is already in use, the old value will be forgotten.
trans-unit.target: 主要操作是存储键值映射（ #[]= ）和查询与键关联的值（ #[] ）。键值映射也可以删除（ #delete ）。键在哈希中是唯一的。当添加具有已使用键的键-值映射时，旧值将被忘记。

trans-unit.source: Main operations are storing a key-value mapping (#[]=) and querying the value associated to a key (#[]). Key-value mappings can also be deleted (#delete). Keys are unique within a hash. When adding a key-value mapping with a key that is already in use, the old value will be forgotten.
trans-unit.target: 主要操作是存储键值映射（ #[]= ）和查询与键关联的值（ #[] ）。键值映射也可以删除（ #delete ）。键在哈希中是唯一的。当添加具有已使用键的键-值映射时，旧值将被忘记。

trans-unit.source: Make sure a supported LLVM version is present in the path. Currently, Crystal supports LLVM 3.8, 3.9, 4.0, 5.0 and 6.0. When possible, use the latest supported version (6.0).
trans-unit.target: 确保路径中存在支持的LLVM版本。目前,Crystal 支持 LLVM 3.8、3.9、4.0、5.0 和 6.0。在可能的情况下,请使用最新支持的版本(6.0)。

trans-unit.source: Make sure to always benchmark code by compiling with the --release flag.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用 --release 标志进行编译，确保始终对代码进行基准测试。

trans-unit.source: Make sure to always profile programs by compiling or running them with the --release flag, which turns on optimizations.
trans-unit.target: 确保始终通过使用 --release 标志编译或运行它们来概要分析程序，这会启用优化。

trans-unit.source: Make sure to install all the required libraries. You might also want to read the contributing guide.
trans-unit.target: 确保安装所有必需的库。您可能还需要阅读提供帮助的指南。

trans-unit.source: Makes Colorize.enabledtrue if and only if both of STDOUT.tty? and STDERR.tty? are true and the tty is not considered a dumb terminal.
trans-unit.target: 当且仅当两个 STDOUT.tty? 都使 Colorize.enabled 为 true 时？和 STDERR.tty? 是 true ，并且tty不被视为哑终端。

trans-unit.source: Makes Colorize.enabledtrue if and only if both of STDOUT.tty? and STDERR.tty? are true and the tty is not considered a dumb terminal. This is determined by the environment variable called TERM. If TERM=dumb, color won't be enabled.
trans-unit.target: 当且仅当两个 STDOUT.tty? 都使 Colorize.enabled 为 true 时？和 STDERR.tty? 是 true ，并且tty不被视为哑终端。这由称为 TERM 的环境变量确定。如果 TERM=dumb ，则不会启用颜色。

trans-unit.source: Makes Colorize.enabledtrue if and only if both of STDOUT.tty? and STDERR.tty? are true.
trans-unit.target: 当且仅当两个 STDOUT.tty? 都使 Colorize.enabled 为 true 时？和 STDERR.tty? 是 true 。

trans-unit.source: Makes a new String by adding str to itself times times.
trans-unit.target: 通过将str自身乘以 times 来创建新的 String 。

trans-unit.source: Makes an Array by splitting the string on separator (and removing instances of separator).
trans-unit.target: 使一个 Array 通过分裂在串分离器（和删除实例分离器）。

trans-unit.source: Makes an Array by splitting the string on the given character separator (and removing that character).
trans-unit.target: 通过在给定的字符分隔符上拆分字符串（并删除该字符）来创建 Array 。

trans-unit.source: Makes an array by splitting the string on any amount of ASCII whitespace characters (and removing that whitespace).
trans-unit.target: 通过在任意数量的ASCII空格字符上拆分字符串(并删除该空格)来制作一个数组。

trans-unit.source: Makes this hash compare keys using their object identity (object_id) for types that define such method (Reference types, but also structs that might wrap other Reference types and delegate the object_id method to them).
trans-unit.target: 使散列比较键使用它们的对象标识（ object_id) 来定义定义此方法的类型（ Reference 类型，以及可能包装其他 Reference 类型并将 object_id 方法委托给它们的结构）。

trans-unit.source: Makes this set compare objects using their object identity (object_id) for types that define such method (Reference types, but also structs that might wrap other Reference types and delegate the object_id method to them).
trans-unit.target: 使得使用它们的对象标识（这一套比较对象 object_id) 为定义这样的方法（类型 Reference 类型，可能包装等，而且结构 Reference 类型和委托 object_id 方法把它们）。

trans-unit.source: Making sure a method returns nil without needing to add an extra nil at the end, or at every return point
trans-unit.target: 确保方法返回 nil 而无需在末尾或每个返回点添加额外的 nil

trans-unit.source: Many Regex::MatchData methods deal with capture groups, and accept an integer argument to select the desired capture group. Capture groups are numbered starting from 1, so that 0 can be used to refer to the entire regular expression without needing to capture it explicitly.
trans-unit.target: 许多 Regex::MatchData 方法处理捕获组，并接受整数参数以选择所需的捕获组。捕获组从 1 开始编号，因此 0 可以用于引用整个正则表达式，而无需显式捕获它。

trans-unit.source: Many programming languages and tools implement their own regular expression language, but Crystal uses PCRE, a popular C library for providing regular expressions. Here give a brief summary of the most basic features of regular expressions - grouping, repetition, and alternation - but the feature set of PCRE extends far beyond these, and we don't attempt to describe it in full here. For more information, refer to the PCRE documentation, especially the full pattern syntax or syntax quick reference.
trans-unit.target: 许多编程语言和工具都实现了自己的正则表达式语言，但Crystal使用PCRE（一种流行的C库提供正则表达式）。这里简要概述了正则表达式的最基本功能-分组，重复和交替-但是PCRE的功能集远远超出了这些范围，因此我们在这里不尝试对其进行完整描述。有关更多信息，请参阅PCRE文档，尤其是完整模式语法或语法快速参考。

trans-unit.source: Many projects use a custom spec helper file, usually named spec/spec_helper.cr.
trans-unit.target: 许多项目使用自定义的规范帮助程序文件，通常名为 spec/spec_helper.cr 。

trans-unit.source: Many types in the standard library, like Array, Hash, Set and Deque, and all primitive types, define #dup and clone.
trans-unit.target: 标准库中的许多类型（例如 Array ， Hash ， Set 和 Deque ）以及所有原始类型都定义 #dup 和 clone 。

trans-unit.source: Marking a Crystal struct with this attribute makes it possible to use it in lib declarations:
trans-unit.target: 用这个属性标记一个Crystal结构,可以在lib声明中使用它。

trans-unit.source: Marking a class as abstract will also prevent us from creating an instance of it:
trans-unit.target: 将一个类标记为抽象类,也会阻止我们创建它的实例。

trans-unit.source: Marking a method as returning Nil will make it return nil regardless of what it actually returns:
trans-unit.target: 将方法标记为返回 Nil 会使方法返回 nil ,无论它实际返回什么：

trans-unit.source: Marks a C struct as packed, which prevents the automatic insertion of padding bytes between fields. This is typically only needed if the C library explicitly uses packed structs.
trans-unit.target: 将C结构标记为已打包，以防止在字段之间自动插入填充字节。通常只有在C库显式使用打包结构时才需要这样做。

trans-unit.source: Marks a method or lib fun as potentially raising an exception. This is explained in the callbacks section.
trans-unit.target: 将方法或lib fun标记为可能引发异常。回调部分对此进行了说明。

trans-unit.source: Marks a method or lib fun as returning twice. The C setjmp is an example of such a function.
trans-unit.target: 将方法或lib fun标记为返回两次。C setjmp 是此类功能的一个示例。

trans-unit.source: Marks an enum as a "flags enum", which changes the behaviour of some of its methods, like to_s.
trans-unit.target: 将枚举标记为“ flags枚举”，这将更改其某些方法的行为，例如 to_s 。

trans-unit.source: Martin Fowler defines Continuous Integration as a software development practice where members of a team integrate their work frequently, usually each person integrates at least daily - leading to multiple integrations per day. Each integration is verified by an automated build (including test) to detect integration errors as quickly as possible. Many teams find that this approach leads to significantly reduced integration problems and allows a team to develop cohesive software more rapidly.
trans-unit.target: 马丁·福勒（Martin Fowler）将持续集成定义为一种软件开发实践，其中团队成员经常集成他们的工作，通常每个人至少每天集成一次，从而导致每天多次集成。每个集成都通过自动构建（包括测试）进行验证，以尽快检测到集成错误。许多团队发现这种方法可以大大减少集成问题，并允许团队更快地开发具有凝聚力的软件。
在字节索引处进行匹配。

trans-unit.source: Match at byte index. It behaves like #match_at_byte_inbdex, however it returns Bool value. It neither returns MatchData nor assigns it to the $~ variable.
trans-unit.target: 在字节索引处匹配。它的行为类似于 #match_at_byte_inbdex ，但是它返回 Bool 值。它既不返回 MatchData 也不将其分配给 $~ 变量。

trans-unit.source: Match at byte index. Matches a regular expression against Stringstr. Starts at the byte index given by pos if given, otherwise at the start of str. Returns a Regex::MatchData if str matched, otherwise nil. $~ will contain the same value that was returned.
trans-unit.target: 在字节索引处匹配。将正则表达式与 String str匹配。从pos给定的字节索引（如果给定）开始，否则从str的开始。如果str匹配，则返回 Regex::MatchData ，否则返回 nil 。 $~ 将包含与返回值相同的值。
在字符索引处进行匹配。

trans-unit.source: Match at character index. It behaves like #match, however it returns Bool value. It neither returns MatchData nor assigns it to the $~ variable.
trans-unit.target: 在字符索引处匹配。它的行为类似于 #match ，但是它返回 Bool 值。它既不返回 MatchData 也不将其分配给 $~ 变量。

trans-unit.source: Match at character index. Matches a regular expression against Stringstr. Starts at the character index given by pos if given, otherwise at the start of str. Returns a Regex::MatchData if str matched, otherwise nil. $~ will contain the same value that was returned.
trans-unit.target: 在字符索引处匹配。将正则表达式与 String str匹配。从pos给定的字符索引（如果给定）开始，否则从str的开始。如果str匹配，则返回 Regex::MatchData ，否则返回 nil 。 $~ 将包含与返回值相同的值。

trans-unit.source: Match. Matches a regular expression against other and returns the starting position of the match if other is a matching String, otherwise nil. $~ will contain a Regex::MatchData if there was a match, nil otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 比赛。将正则表达式与other匹配，如果other是匹配的 String ，则返回匹配的开始位置，否则返回 nil 。 $~ 如果匹配则包含一个 Regex::MatchData ，否则为 nil 。

trans-unit.source: Match. When the argument is not a String, always returns nil.
trans-unit.target: 比赛。当参数不是 String 时，始终返回 nil 。
